name: Dr. Gauri Agarwal
subtitle: Founder & Chief IVF Specialist
description: Dr. Gauri Agarwal is a renowned fertility specialist and the visionary founder of Seeds of Innocens IVF Centre. With over 15 years of experience in reproductive medicine, she has dedicated her career to helping couples achieve their dream of parenthood.

Her expertise spans across advanced IVF techniques, reproductive endocrinology, and minimally invasive fertility procedures. Dr. Agarwal is known for her compassionate approach to patient care and her commitment to staying at the forefront of fertility medicine.

Under her leadership, Seeds of Innocens has grown from a single center to a network of fertility clinics across India and internationally, helping thousands of couples achieve successful pregnancies through personalized, evidence-based treatments.
qualification: MBBS, MD (Obstetrics & Gynecology), Fellowship in Reproductive Medicine
specialization: IVF, Reproductive Endocrinology, Advanced Fertility Techniques

name: Dr. Aditi Bhatnagar
subtitle: Senior IVF Specialist
description: Dr. Aditi Bhatnagar is a highly experienced IVF specialist with expertise in advanced reproductive medicine. She specializes in complex infertility cases, recurrent implantation failures, and personalized IVF protocols.

With a patient-centric approach, Dr. Bhatnagar ensures that each couple receives individualized care tailored to their specific needs. Her commitment to excellence and compassionate care has helped numerous couples achieve successful pregnancies.
She stays updated with the latest advancements in fertility medicine and is actively involved in research to improve success rates and patient outcomes.
qualification: MBBS, MD (Obstetrics & Gynecology), Fellowship in IVF
specialization: IVF, ICSI, Advanced Reproductive Techniques

name: Dr. Nivedita Nehal
subtitle: Senior IVF Specialist
description: Dr. Nivedita Nehal is an accomplished IVF specialist with extensive experience in reproductive endocrinology and infertility. She specializes in treating complex infertility cases and has a special interest in PCOS management and hormonal disorders.

Her expertise includes advanced IVF techniques, ovulation induction, and management of recurrent pregnancy losses. Dr. Nehal is known for her empathetic approach and dedication to helping couples achieve their parenthood goals.
She actively participates in continuing medical education and stays abreast of the latest developments in fertility treatments to provide the best care to her patients.
qualification: MBBS, MD (Obstetrics & Gynecology), Fellowship in Reproductive Endocrinology
specialization: IVF, PCOS Management, Hormonal Disorders

name: Dr. Lisha Singh
subtitle: IVF Specialist
description: Dr. Lisha Singh is a dedicated IVF specialist with comprehensive expertise in reproductive medicine. She has a special interest in treating couples with unexplained infertility and recurrent implantation failures.

Her approach combines evidence-based medicine with personalized care, ensuring optimal outcomes for her patients. Dr. Singh is committed to providing compassionate support throughout the fertility journey.
She continuously updates her knowledge through active participation in national and international fertility conferences and workshops.
qualification: MBBS, MD (Obstetrics & Gynecology), Fellowship in IVF
specialization: IVF, Unexplained Infertility, Recurrent Implantation Failure

name: Dr. Beena Upadhyay
subtitle: IVF Specialist
description: Dr. Beena Upadhyay is an experienced IVF specialist known for her expertise in managing high-risk pregnancies and complex infertility cases. She has a special focus on age-related fertility issues and advanced maternal age pregnancies.

Her patient-centered approach and attention to detail have earned her recognition among patients and peers. Dr. Upadhyay believes in empowering couples with knowledge and support throughout their fertility journey.
She maintains high standards of clinical excellence and is dedicated to achieving the best possible outcomes for every patient.
qualification: MBBS, MD (Obstetrics & Gynecology), Fellowship in Reproductive Medicine
specialization: IVF, High-Risk Pregnancies, Age-Related Fertility

name: Dr. Debilina Roy
subtitle: IVF Specialist
description: Dr. Debilina Roy is a compassionate IVF specialist with extensive experience in reproductive medicine. She specializes in personalized treatment protocols and has a keen interest in improving success rates through advanced techniques.

Her holistic approach to patient care ensures that both physical and emotional aspects of fertility treatment are addressed. Dr. Roy is known for her excellent communication skills and ability to make patients feel comfortable.
She is actively involved in research and stays updated with the latest innovations in fertility treatments to offer cutting-edge care to her patients.
qualification: MBBS, MD (Obstetrics & Gynecology), DNB in Reproductive Medicine
specialization: IVF, Personalized Treatment Protocols, Advanced Embryology

name: Dr. Rashmi Singh
subtitle: IVF Specialist
description: Dr. Rashmi Singh is a dedicated IVF specialist with a passion for helping couples overcome fertility challenges. She has extensive experience in managing various infertility conditions and is skilled in advanced reproductive techniques.

Her empathetic approach and ability to build strong patient relationships have contributed to her high success rates. Dr. Singh believes in treating each patient as unique and tailoring treatments accordingly.
She is committed to providing world-class fertility care and continuously enhances her skills through ongoing education and training.
qualification: MBBS, MD (Obstetrics & Gynecology), Fellowship in IVF
specialization: IVF, Infertility Management, Advanced Reproductive Techniques

She stays at the forefront of medical advances and incorporates the latest evidence-based treatments into her practice.
